th.analyze_duration_info: ระบุจำนวนไมโครวินาทีที่จะวิเคราะห์เพื่อตรวจสอบอินพุต ค่าที่สูงกว่าจะช่วยให้ตรวจจับข้อมูลได้แม่นยำยิ่งขึ้น แต่จะเพิ่มเวลาในการตอบสนอง ค่าเริ่มต้นคือ 5,000,000 ไมโครวินาที = 5 วินาที (- ระยะเวลาการวิเคราะห์)

th.backup_info_download: ดาวน์โหลดไฟล์สำรองของสภาพแวดล้อม camera.ui ทั้งหมดของคุณ สิ่งนี้จะสำรองเนื้อหาทั้งหมด (รวมถึงการบันทึก) ของไดเร็กทอรีที่เก็บข้อมูล camera.ui ของคุณ คุณสามารถกู้คืนได้ในภายหลังบนแพลตฟอร์มใด ๆ ที่ camera.ui ทำงานอยู่ได้
th.backup_info_restore: กู้คืนข้อมูลสำรองที่คุณสร้างไว้ก่อนหน้านี้โดยใช้ camera.ui การกำหนดค่า camera.ui ฐานข้อมูล การบันทึก และบัญชีผู้ใช้ camera.ui ของคุณจะถูกกู้คืน
th.backup_info_shedule: การสำรองข้อมูลเต็มรูปแบบของฐานข้อมูล camera.ui จะถูกสร้างโดยอัตโนมัติทุกวันในเวลา 12:00:00 น. และเก็บไว้เป็นเวลา 7 วัน

th.press_enter_to_create: Press %Enter% to create a new label
th.privacyMode_info: Turn off the camera feed and replace it with a privacy image in HomeKit
th.privacySwitch_info: Exposes a 'privacyMode' switch to replace the camera feed with a privacy image in HomeKit
th.probe_size_info: Set probing size in bytes, i.e. the size of the data to analyze to get stream information. A higher value will enable detecting more information in case it is dispersed into the stream, but will increase latency. Must be an integer not lesser than 32. It is 5000000 by default (-probesize).
th.read_rate_info: Read input at native frame rate (-re).
th.record_on_movement_info: Enables recording video (eg on movement) through UI and NOT through external controller.
th.recording_text: The @ was taken on % by a #.
th.recording_timer_not_editable: Recording time cannot be edited. Settings can be changed in config.json.
th.recording_type_not_editable: Recording type cannot be edited. Settings can be changed in config.json.
th.recordings_nav_info: Manage the recording settings and specify the recording type
th.rekognition_nav_info: Image analysis for motion detection via Amazon Rekognition
th.remove_all_confirm_text: After clicking 'Remove all' all stored @ will be irrevocably deleted. Are you sure?
th.remove_camera_confirm_text: Do you really want to delete the camera '@'?
th.remove_camera_confirm_text_homebridge: Do you really want to delete the camera '@'? This will also remove the camera from Homebridge!
th.reorder_queue_size_info: Packets may be received out of order, so before they can be passed onwards, they need to be reordered. Default jitter buffer size is 500. This option allows you to specify it manually. Higher values will lead to greater latency. Only applicable for reception over UDP (-reorder_queue_size).
th.reset_confirm_text: After clicking 'Reset' all stored data will be irrevocably deleted. Are you sure?
th.restart_confirm_text: Do you really want to reboot @?
th.rss_feed_widget_info: Please enter a valid RSS URL to see the feed in the widget.
th.sensitivity_info: The percentage of pixels (see Differnce) required to trigger a movement (a low sensitivity means that more pixel differences have to be detected, a high sensitivity means that less pixel differences have to be detected)
th.serialNumber_info: Set the serial number for display in the Home app
th.shortcuts_widget_info: Please select the action from the list to show it in the shortcuts.
th.source_info: FFmpeg options on where to find and how to decode your camera's video stream. The most basic form is '-i' followed by your camera's URL.
th.start_end_message:
And thats it.
Have fun with camera.ui!
th.start_info_message:
You must change your credentials
before logging in to camera.ui
th.still_image_source_info: If your camera also provides a URL for a still image, that can be defined here with the same syntax as 'source'. If not set, camera.ui will grab one frame from 'source'.
th.sub_source_info: Low Resolution Substream. FFmpeg options on where to find and how to decode your camera's video substream. The most basic form is '-i' followed by your camera's URL. The substream will be used to probe the stream or for motion detection through video analysis.
th.system_nav_info: Manage the backend settings of camera.ui
th.telegram_type_not_editable: Telegram cannot be changed for this camera.
th.timeout_info: Socket TCP I/O timeout in seconds. If you have problems with hanging FFmpeg processes in the background, you can enter any value here to stop the process automatically after the entered time, if no response comes (-stimeout).
th.unbridge_info: Bridged cameras can cause slowdowns of the entire Homebridge instance. If unbridged, the camera will need to be added to HomeKit manually.
th.use_interface_timer_info: If enabled, the recording timer from camera.ui will be used for "motionTimeout".
th.users_nav_info: Delete existing users or create new ones
th.video_codec_info: Set the codec used for encoding video sent to HomeKit, must be H.264-based. You can change to a hardware accelerated video codec with this option, if one is available (-vcodec).
th.video_filter_info: Comma-delimited list of additional video filters for FFmpeg to run on the video. If 'none' is included, the default video filters are disabled (-filter:v).
th.videoanalysis_info: Activates Video Analysis for motion detection (a low resolution sub stream is preferred or prebuffering enabled)
th.weather_widget_info: Please search for your city name in English to activate the weather widget.
th.weather_widget_info_owm: Weather data is provided by OpenWeather.
th.welcome_submessage: The web interface for your RTSP capable cameras
th.width_info: The width used for video stream.
